entries.name: parse_printf_format(format, opts)
entries.desc: Returns an array of the given format and opts to be used by Kernel#sprintf, if there was a successful Regexp match in the given format from printf

entries.name: pp(*objs)
entries.desc: Prints the given objs calling Object#inspect on each.

entries.name: ppx(prefix, *objs)
entries.desc: Prints the given objs calling Object#inspect on each and appending the given prefix.

entries.name: print(*opts)
entries.desc: Open this method to implement your own output method, raises a NotImplementedError if you don't define print in your own class.

entries.name: printf(format, *opts)
entries.desc: Extends IO#printf to format the given opts for Kernel#sprintf using parse_printf_format

entries.name: printn(*opts)
entries.desc: Prints the given opts, with a newline delimiter.

entries.name: puts(*objs)
entries.desc: Calls print on each element in the given objs, followed by a newline character.
